title: No Head for Her Pillow
description: WHO - left lighted candles by the body of a murdered girl- and took her head?WHAT - was the connection between a pair of glamorous two-timing redheads and the slot machine king?HOW - did a Mongol emperor who died in the 13th century help solve a murder in the 20th?These are a few of the brain teasers that private eye Neal Cotten has to answer in this tough, fast-paced thriller of the slot machine racket in a Southern California town.
author: Sam S. Taylor
